import React, {useState, useRef, useEffect} from 'react'; import {Editor, EditorState} from 'draft-js'; import style from 'styled-components'; import './HomePage.css'; import { FaUserTag, FaImage} from "react-icons/fa"; const StyleEditor = style.div` width: 824px; max-height: 200px; overflow-y: auto; margin-left: 10px; font-size: 14px; `; function HomePage(props){ const [editorState, setEditorState] = useState(() => EditorState.createEmpty(), ); const createPostInputRef = useRef(); useEffect(() => { let createPostInput = createPostInputRef.current; createPostInput.focus() },[props.showModalCreatePost]) function showModalCreatePostFunc(){ props.showModalCreatePostFunc() } return(
showModalCreatePostFunc()} style={props.showModalCreatePost ? {position: 'relative', zIndex: '10'} : null}>

) } export default HomePage;
